abstract: Even as Ford posted its 12th consecutive monthly U.S. sales decline, General Motors and Toyota each gained market share in October on higher truck sales.
snippet: Even as Ford posted its 12th consecutive monthly U.S. sales decline, General Motors and Toyota each gained market share in October on higher truck sales.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT, Nov. 1 — The Ford Motor Company posted its 12th consecutive monthly decline yesterday, while General Motors and Toyota Motor each gained market share in the United States in October on higher truck sales.

headline.main: Sales at Ford Decrease for the 12th Month in a Row
headline.print_headline: Sales at Ford Decrease for the 12th Month in a Row
